about_the_game:
Estranged for a couple of years, a young man rushes back to his childhood home. Dismayed by the news of his father losing his sight and inching closer to his demise, Marius, a priest in training, suspends his long studies at the seminary to be close in his final days to the man who taught him dignity and stalwartness. Under the gloom of impending death, the oldest son of honorable Leon Rosenthal can’t conceive the encroaching events that his arrival will unfold, equally exhilarating and petrifying.

The Crimson Maid is an adventure game with a focus on dialogues, exploring and solving light puzzles. Play as Marius as he returns home to spend time with his family. His attention is diverted by the alluring young maid Irina. But their flirting is quickly cut short as death soon disrupts the very feeble balance of this family.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains a brief depiction of blood in a cinematic. Some dialogues include flirting and mild sexual innuendo. There is a cinematic with obscured upper body nudity and an obscured naked posterior.

short_description: As a secret celestial curse takes hold of his father, a young cleric finds himself enraptured by the charms of a strikingly beautiful maid. A period drama that combines romance and murder mystery, with a dash of supernatural.
